questions.question: You just got your icecream from the icecream man,but he was so busy he forgot to take the money

choices.answer: Put the money back in your pocket.
Get his attention and tell him you need to pay.
Eat your ice cream fast- he will never know.
Tell him you gave him $5 and you need change.

questions.question: You borrowed your friend's bike and accidentally broke it.

choices.answer: Tell her you had an accident and will pay for it.
Tell her you didn't realize it was broken.
Blame it on a friend.
Try to convince her that the bike was already broken.

questions.question: Ur sitting in a doctor's office reading a magazine. There's something in the magazine u want.

choices.answer: Remember the magazine and go buy it yourself.
Ask the receptionist if you can tear it out.
Not ask and just tear it out.
Don't tear it out- take the whole magazine.

questions.question: The person in front of you at the store checkout walked away and left some items.

choices.answer: Mind your own business and leave it alone.
Tell the cashier that she left her items.
Call her back and tell her she left them.
Throw the items in your bag since they are paid for.

questions.question: You pick up the phone and accidentally hear your sister talking to her boyfriend.

choices.answer: Hang up the phone.
Say hello as if you thought the call was for you.
Just listen. Very quietly.
Hum into the phone to get on their nerves.

questions.question: All of your friends are smoking. They are making fun of you because you are not.

choices.answer: Not listen to them and forget about smoking.
Make believe you smoke so they stop bugging you.
Ask one of them for a cigarette.
Go buy some for the guys so they will like you.

questions.question: You were visiting a friend and your dog has an accident in his living room.

choices.answer: Clean it up and apologize.
Tell your friend about it.
Move the chair over it so it can't be seen.
Take your dog and leave without saying anything.

questions.question: You're standing in line at the store checkout and you see it's going to be a long wait.

choices.answer: Be patient and wait your turn.
Leave with your item and come back to pay for it later.
Take your item without ever paying.
Cut to the front of the line and act like you were first.

questions.question: You are home alone and someone knocks on the door.

choices.answer: Not answer the door.
Tell the person your parents aren't home.
Ignore it.
Open the door.

questions.question: An elderly woman is trying to get in the elevator and she's carrying a lot of packages.

choices.answer: Ask if you can help with the packages.
Hold the door for her.
Rush into the elevator and push the close button.
Get in the elevator first.

questions.question: Your friend loaned you a dollar and now he wants you to pay him back.

choices.answer: Put off paying him as long as possible.
Pay him the money that you owe him.
Tell him that another friend owes you $ & get it from her.
Tell him you don't remember borrowing any money.

questions.question: You see a dog walking in the hallway at school.

choices.answer: Run up to the dog and pet him.
Ask the owner for permission to pet the dog.
Notice that it's a working dog and you shouldn't pet him.
Scream and point so all your friends see.

questions.question: Your room is a mess and really has to be cleaned up.

choices.answer: Start cleaning it up a little at a time.
Spend an entire day cleaning your room.
Put if off to do another day.
Forget about it. Your mom will clean it.

questions.question: Your father left his car keys in the ignition.

choices.answer: Tell your father about the keys right away.
Take the keys out of the ignition& give them to your father.
Turn on the  motor just to see what it feels like.
Drive the car around the block.

questions.question: A boy in your class just walked out the bathroom with his zipper open.

choices.answer: Go over and whisper to him.
Yell to him across the room and tell him.
Show it to girls walking by.
Suggest that he goes speak to the teacher.
